kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
I just attended [CMS Connect 25 in Montreal](https://www.boye-co.com/conferences/cmsconnect25/) (Brian was also there ^). I wrote about my experiences [in a blog post](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/cms-connect-25-questions-answer-sean-wright-ruuqc/?trackingId=w3j2KXA6ml5ZI4wQaTubsw%3D%3D) if you're interested in my thoughts on the sessions and event.
In regards to the discussion about in-person events, attending this one was another great reminder why gathering with others to learn and discuss is fun, valuable, and important for personal and professional growth.
I also recognize it's not always possible to attend events in-person (as Milan mentioned above) - a lot is dependent on where you happen to live and your budget for travel.
